title: Chandrika Pearl and Ruby Tassel Haaram - A Timeless South Indian Treasure
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting lustre.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a central floral motif adorned with a large, radiant CZ stone surrounded by smaller CZs. A delicate lotus-inspired ruby accent complements the design. The handcrafted pearl tassel, interspersed with ruby beads, adds a touch of traditional elegance and movement. Features a delicate filigree design.
occasions: and special occasions. Perfectly suited for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function. Can also elevate a contemporary evening look.
description: This Chandrika Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with a contemporary aesthetic. The use of natural pearls and vibrant rubies exudes luxury, while the intricate detailing showcases exceptional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. It is a statement piece that embodies elegance, cultural heritage, and enduring style.
